topic.title: TRANSFERRED FROM NEONATAL INTENSIVE CARE UNIT FOR NECROTISING ENTEROCOLITIS MANAGEMENT INDICATOR
topic.shortdesc: For the National Neonatal Data Set - Episodic and Daily Care, TRANSFERRED FROM NEONATAL INTENSIVE CARE UNIT FOR NECROTISING ENTEROCOLITIS MANAGEMENT INDICATOR is reported when the PATIENTÂ is transferred for management of Necrotising Enterocolitis following an Abdominal X-Ray.
